sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_91a60627db517200b793f2b6ae9619d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PESparkline</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>PESparkline</name><script><![CDATA[var PESparkline = Class.create();
PESparkline.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	randNumber: function(min, max) {
		return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
	},
	getSparklineData: function(param1) {
		var scope = this;
		return [{
			"name": "Random Data 1",
			"data": [
				["Data Point 1", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 2", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 3", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 4", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 5", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 6", scope.randNumber(60, 100)],
				["Data Point 7", scope.randNumber(60, 100)]
			]
		}];
	},

    type: 'PESparkline'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-10 16:09:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>91a60627db517200b793f2b6ae9619d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PESparkline</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_91a60627db517200b793f2b6ae9619d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-10 16:15:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_149cc253db5d3200b793f2b6ae9619a4
sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-light-theme: #283347 !default; $pe-dark-theme: #1c2432 !default; .task-carousel { h2 { color: $pe-header-color; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; height: 28px; margin: 0 0 10px 0; } .carousel { margin-bottom: 25px; .carousel-indicators { margin-bottom: -6%; li { border: 1px solid $pe-light-theme; opacity: .3; } .active { background-color: $pe-dark-theme; opacity: 1; } } } .panel { border: 0; color: $pe-light-theme; background-color: transparent; .panel-heading { border-bottom: 0 !important; background-color: $pe-light-theme !important; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; padding: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .panel-body { background-color: $pe-dark-theme; color: #fff; } .panel-analysis { background-color: $pe-dark-theme !important; h3 { font-size: 18px; text-transform: capitalize; margin: 0 !important; } } .panel-body-tasks { font-weight: 100 !important; padding-bottom: 0; padding-top: 0; white-space: nowrap; img { height: 24.1px; width: 79px; } .row { border-bottom: 2px solid #3d4e6d; padding: 15px 0 8px 0 !important; } .no-border-bottom { border: none !important; } } .panel-footer-analysis { background-color: $pe-dark-theme !important; border-color: $pe-dark-theme !important; padding: 14px 0 20px 0; .show-more { background-color: $pe-light-theme; border-radius: 25px; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; padding: 7px 16.5px; text-transform: uppercase; } } } .left-arrow { height: 14px; margin-right: 50px; width: 8px; } .right-arrow { height: 14px; margin-left: 50px; width: 8px; } }sp_instancefalsepe-task-carouselfalsePE Task Carouselfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-03-09 21:56:25true149cc253db5d3200b793f2b6ae9619a442PE Task Carouselglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_149cc253db5d3200b793f2b6ae9619a4admin2017-03-20 21:04:29

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_ab44aa5bdb5d3200b793f2b6ae961973
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function(spUtil) {
	var c = this;
	if (!c.myAreaChart) {
		spUtil.get("pe-area-chart", {
			options: {
				script_include: "PESparkline",
				function_name: "getSparklineData",
				advance: JSON.stringify(c.data.chart)
			}
		}).then(function(response) {
			c.myAreaChart = response;
		});
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>pe-sparkline</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>PE Sparkline</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */
  var serverOptions = input.options ? input.options : (input.parameters ? input.parameters : {});
  serverOptions.gradientEnd = serverOptions.gradientEnd || "rgba(255, 0, 80, 1)";
  serverOptions.gradientStart = serverOptions.gradientStart || "rgba(255, 207, 96, 1)";
  data.chart = {
    xAxis: {
      visible: false
    },
    yAxis: {
      visible: false,
      max: 100,
      min: 0,
      gridLineWidth: 0
    },
    title: {
      text: ''
    },
    options: {
      exporting: {
        enabled: false
      },
      legend: {
        enabled: false
      },
      chart: {
        //type:"areaspline",
        backgroundColor: null,
        margin: [2, 0, 2, 0],
        borderWidth: 0,
        height:25,
        width:79
      },
      plotOptions: {
        series: {
          enableMouseTracking: false,
          marker: {
            enabled: false
          },
          lineColor: serverOptions.gradientStart,
          lineWidth: 0,
          fillColor: {
            linearGradient: [0, 0, 0, 20],
            stops: [
              [0, serverOptions.gradientStart],
              [1, serverOptions.gradientEnd]
            ]
          }
        }
      }
    }
  };
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-09 23:40:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ab44aa5bdb5d3200b793f2b6ae961973</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PE Sparkline</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_ab44aa5bdb5d3200b793f2b6ae961973</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-10 16:20:42</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<sp-widget widget="c.myAreaChart"></sp-widget>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>
